In pilot study investigator aim evaluate feasibility use cognitive computer training patient unipolar depression enhance cognitive performance . Further investigator investigate whether intervention shortens sick leave .
DOC.brief_title: Cognitive Computer Training Patients With Depression
DOC.detailed_description: This study evaluate cognitive computer training patient remission depression measure compliance effect , investigate whether patient return earlier work examine patient ' physical psychological health . This do comparing intervention group control group . Outpatients psychiatric department Odense Denmark recruit December 2015 July 2017 . At enrolment participant wil randomize 1:1 either intervention group control group . After participant complete clinical interview answer The Short Form ( 36 ) Health Survey ( SF-36 ) questionnaire . The participant ' cognitive function depression severity measure baseline three month follow-up . At nine month follow-up participant receive email SF-36 questionnaire question education work status , require answer . The intervention cognitive computer program , consist different computer game . The intervention start enrolment finish three month follow-up . The participant intervention group train session last 10-20 minute three time week . Each participant end total 36 training session .
